title: WATCHMEN Episode 1 Breakdown, Theories, and Details You Missed!
author: Think Story
comment: Who watches the Watchmen? I DO!

There is nothing wrong with saying it was a“Massacre” because it definitely was not a race riot. Black people were not the aggressor they were trying to protect themselves and their businesses, from racist mobs simple. It was a massacre.

"Race Riot" WRONG! It was a massacre!!

They weren't "killed", they were murdered! Get it right!

It was not a riot, it was a massacre. 
It was a way to transfer wealth from a wealthy and vibrant community to a bunch of rich white racists.
I loved the first episode, but MANY Oklahomans of every color, sat with jaws open watching a carefully covered wound ripped open
FYI the last survivor of the Tulsa massacre recently died.
description:
In this video we take a deep dive and breakdown episode 1 "It's Summer and We're Running Out of Ice" of HBO's latest series Watchmen based off the graphic novel by Alan Moore and Dave Gibbons.

Follow me on twitter: www.twitter.com/thinkstoryYT
